jobDescription: Netflix is a pioneer in the entertainment industry, merging the creativity of Hollywood with the technical innovation of Silicon Valley. Netflix currently serves over 125 million subscribers in more than 190 countries around the world and is slated to spend over $8 billion on television, films, documentaries and other entertainment content in 2018 alone.  As Netflix continues to grow - we are leveraging the unique position we have as both a content distributor and producer to create cutting edge machine-learning models that predict audience reach for any television series or film in the world - past, present, and future. These models support a variety of people making decisions about the content we make and buy and need to be turned into intuitive and user-friendly tools.  We're looking for a technical product manager with 3+ years of experience with data science and software engineering to coordinate between a growing team of machine-learning researchers, engineers and designers to develop a set of tools that will help leverage machine-learning derived insights for content acquisition and marketing decisions.SDL2017
